languages.text: Узнать всю правду о том, что происходит на планетоиде, и остановить мятеж можно только добравшись до зачинщика — коменданта тюрьмы.
The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.
languages.original_text: Узнать всю правду о том, что происходит на планетоиде, и остановить мятеж можно только добравшись до зачинщика — коменданта тюрьмы.

traits.locale_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.
The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.
The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

languages.text: Der einzige Weg, den Aufstand zu beenden und die Wahrheit über den Planetoiden aufzudecken, besteht darin, den Direktor zu finden, der die Kette finsterer Ereignisse ausgelöst hat.
languages.original_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

traits.locale_text: Der einzige Weg, den Aufstand zu beenden und die Wahrheit über den Planetoiden aufzudecken, besteht darin, den Direktor zu finden, der die Kette finsterer Ereignisse ausgelöst hat.

languages.text: Le seul moyen de mettre un terme à la rébellion et de découvrir la vérité sur le planétoïde est de trouver le gardien responsable de cette sinistre série d'évènements.
languages.original_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

traits.locale_text: Le seul moyen de mettre un terme à la rébellion et de découvrir la vérité sur le planétoïde est de trouver le gardien responsable de cette sinistre série d'évènements.

languages.text: 反乱を阻止し、小惑星の真実を明らかにする唯一の方法は、不吉な出来事の連鎖を招いた所長を見つけることだ。
languages.original_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

traits.locale_text: 反乱を阻止し、小惑星の真実を明らかにする唯一の方法は、不吉な出来事の連鎖を招いた所長を見つけることだ。

languages.text: La única forma de detener la rebelión y descubrir la verdad sobre el planetoide es encontrar al alcaide que provocó los acontecimientos.
languages.original_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

traits.locale_text: La única forma de detener la rebelión y descubrir la verdad sobre el planetoide es encontrar al alcaide que provocó los acontecimientos.

languages.text: 这颗行星所有的邪恶事件，都是由典狱长本人引起的。只有找到典狱长，才能阻止这场叛乱，揭开这颗小行星的真相。
languages.original_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星所有的邪恶事件，都是由典狱长本人引起的。只有找到典狱长，才能阻止这场叛乱，揭开这颗小行星的真相。

languages.text: İsyanı durdurup cüce gezegen hakkındaki sırrı açığa çıkarmanın tek yolu, uğursuz olaylar silsilesini körükleyen müdürü bulmaktan geçiyor.
languages.original_text: The only way to stop the rebellion and uncover the truth about the planetoid is to find the warden who instigated the chain of sinister events.

traits.locale_text: İsyanı durdurup cüce gezegen hakkındaki sırrı açığa çıkarmanın tek yolu, uğursuz olaylar silsilesini körükleyen müdürü bulmaktan geçiyor.
